reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Evaluating and prioritising UK/China Infrastructure Alliance projects in developing countries.

description.narrative: This project will evaluate up to 200 projects against the UK/China Infrastructure Alliance Project Evaluation Framework and produce plans to target key priority projects The Alliance is designed to contribute to sustainable development in developing countries and ensure the UK and China can make a substantial contribution to meeting infrastructure needs globally through increasing capacity, investment and financing. Prioritisation will ensure the Infrastructure Alliance is able to focus on the most valuable and credible projects that will improve infrastructure and contribute to poverty alleviation. The overall programme is also designed to generate opportunities for international business, including UK companies.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
